txt.en: Now that you have dealt with the local wildlife, Nos Grimsong has asked you to help with restocking supplies for Frerin's Court.

'Well done, [placeholder]. Now that you have dealt with the local wildlife, I don't suppose you could help us restock our supplies?

'Follow the road east out of Frerin's Court around the lake to the east and to the Silver Deep. Inside are several veins of minerals that we need to craft our weapons. Head inside, gather the minerals, and bring the ore back to me.

'Be careful, but be quick!'
The minerals can be found in the Silver Deep, east of the frozen lake to the east of Frerin's Court.\n\nNos Grimsong has asked you to gather minerals for him.
'Excellent work, [placeholder]. This ore should last us for a short time, at least.\n\n'Take this reward, along with my thanks, for all your efforts.'
Nos Grimsong is in Frerin's Court, west of the Silver Deep.\n\nYou should return to Nos Grimsong for your reward.

'Follow the road east out of Frerin's Court around the lake to the east and to the Silver Deep. Inside are several veins of minerals that we need to craft our weapons. Head inside, gather the minerals, and bring the ore back to me.'
'Did you manage to get the minerals we need, [placeholder]?'
Talk to Nos Grimsong at Frerin's Court
